trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> is the base class for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> and can be inherited to support custom implementations of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> é a classe base para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> e pode ser herdada para dar suporte a implementações personalizadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> extends its own base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>, by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> estende a sua própria classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>, substituindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método para ocultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the main purpose of this class for a control developer is that, unlike its parent, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> has a public constructor so it can be inherited directly and used as a public implementation of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o objetivo principal desta classe para um desenvolvedor do controle é que, ao contrário de seu pai, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> tem um construtor público para que possa ser herdada diretamente e usado como uma implementação pública da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the designer bound to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do designer associado ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> do conjunto de propriedades associadas ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Hides the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle" /> property at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oculta a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle" /> no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property in the designer after calling the parent method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> substituições de método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para ocultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> propriedade no designer depois de chamar o método pai.

trans-unit.source: This is because the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control does not render any zone-level verbs.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque o padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controle não processa qualquer verbos de nível de zona.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to render zone-level verbs in a derived class, you must override this method to not hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser processar verbos de nível de zona em uma classe derivada, você deve substituir esse método não ocultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> propriedade.
